replies.body:
You guys are looking too much at the negatives. Think of the more variety of gamemodes we can make? The excuse of "I like it now where we have to actually know how to pvp to win. I'm guessing the shield is for protection... great, another thing that can protect your opponent" 

Obviously, you will be equipped with the same equipment as you're opponent. I fail to see how this deters from knowing how to pvp to win. 

"Now minecraft looks modded" If it is made by one of the developers then it isn't. Ever heard of patches and updates?

My point is, stop complaining and look to the bright side of things. You guys complained about the sprint button, you guys complained about 1.8 additions, im probably guessing you guys complained about 1.6's horses.

#JustAdapt

This isn't the end of the world

replies.body:
Like everyone else, I'm a bit skeptical about the shield, but I'm open to change in Minecraft and I'm excited to see some new stuff.

Honestly I'm more afraid of what the bow will be like. What will the quiver be of use for, and how will the new arrows affect the bow? The bow is already an extremely potent weapon, and I wonder if the devs will make the quiver necessary to carry around. Hopefully not.
replies.body_tagged:
Like everyone else, I'm a bit skeptical about the shield, but I'm open to change in Minecraft and I'm excited to see some new stuff.

Honestly I'm more afraid of what the bow will be like. What will the quiver be of use for, and how will the new arrows affect the bow? The bow is already an extremely potent weapon, and I wonder if the devs will make the quiver necessary to carry around. Hopefully not.

replies.body: again, +1... zintenka is saying some good stuff in this thread. imagine being the minecraft developers, never playing pvp so you don't know what to do. of course you ask the pvp community what they want, right? and dinnerbone did. but some of yall are saying to simplify it and some people are saying to make it more complex and add more. the people who are on the reddit thread telling them what to add are the ones getting their opinions heard. don't say it's "more modded". it's still vanilla minecraft. you can say they're making it more complicated, but saying that here on small minecraft server isn't gonna do anything to prevent it.

replies.body: Ok, you guys aren't making much sense. I do feel iffy about the shield idea, but honestly how does a shield make Minecraft "not simple?" We don't even know how it's going to be used. It could be like bonus armour, or a thing that comes up when you right click, etc. If you think that isn't "simple" then something is wrong.
